job.title: C#, MultiCharts.com
job.description:
I'm seeking someone proficient in C# with experience in the MultiCharts.net framework to create a profitable stock trading system.

In particular, I am interested in the Neural Network Model to monitor as many symbols as needed (200+) simultaneously and make trading decisions simultaneously.

Your role will be to code within the MultiCharts.net platform to accomplish these goals, drawing on your knowledge and best practices in the industry.

Using the Entity Framework, fetching stock symbols into MultiCharts.net from an Azure SQL database.

Implementing trading strategies with indicators like RSI, MACD, etc.

Deciding the right times to enter and exit trades.

Logging trade data back from MultiCharts into the Azure SQL database.

For instance, one fundamental rule is to use limit orders only. Orders should start 5 cents below or above the target price, adjusting by 1 cent until filled, avoiding direct market orders. If an order isn't filled immediately or partially filled, subtract the filled quantity and continue until it is fully completed.

More details will be discussed later.

questions.question: Do you understand Entity Framework and how to integrate it into the MultiCharts.com platform? Could you provide high-level details on how you accomplished this?
Could you provide an example of your previous work on the MultiCharts.com platform? How did you utilize C#? What was the success rate of trades compared to losses?

There is no scope for learning on the job. To minimize costs, you must possess templates that allow you to copy and paste code. If you don't have these, please do not bid on my project. I will not pay for you to learn or to code from scratch. Understand?

This role may become permanent, focusing on optimizing for many symbols, brokers, and crypto, including global markets. Starting with US stocks, successful outcomes could expand the project. Cost efficiency is key.
Share your expertise on Neural Networks and how you applied them on MultiCharts.com. Detail your approach. I will decline your bid if I see AI generated response.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled C# developer to create a desktop application. The project duration is less than 1 month. The ideal candidate should have experience in .NET Framework, Microsoft Windows, Windows App Development, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, Desktop Application, C#, and Microsoft Azure.

As a candidate, we would like you to submit a proposal outlining how you can contribute to the project. Please describe your relevant experience, including any past projects or applications you have developed using C#. We would appreciate it if you could provide links to these projects so we can review them.

Your proposal should highlight your skills in C# programming and demonstrate your ability to develop efficient and user-friendly desktop applications. Additionally, any experience with Microsoft Azure or database integration would be highly valued. We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing the project further.
customFields.finalDescriptionAI: I'm seeking a skilled C# developer with expertise in .NET Framework 8, Entity Framework, and SQL to assist in completing a module for a stock market analysis application I'm developing. The project involves analyzing 1-minute interval bars to identify trend reversals. I need a developer with experience in this area and won't rely on pre-made solutions from GitHub. When applying, please describe your relevant past projects and assess the likelihood of success for the app, mainly if it involves algorithmic trading. Future work may include implementing algo trading using the Alpaca Markets API. Candidates must have proven experience and the ability to develop this project without a learning curve.
